import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import useAuth from '../hooks/useAuth'; import logo from '../assets/wuphf.png' import './header.scss' import { GrHomeRounded } from 'react-icons/gr' import { FiHeart } from 'react-icons/fi' import {CgProfile} from 'react-icons/cg' import { BiExit } from 'react-icons/bi' interface IAvatar { avatar: string; } function Header(props: IAvatar){ const { logout } = useAuth() const pathName = window.location.pathname return(
  • {props.avatar ? : }
) } export default Header;
